an6.52:1.1: Atha kho janussoni brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
an6.52:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho janussoni brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.52:2.1: “Khattiya, bho gotama, kimadhippaya, kimupavicara, kimadhitthana, kimabhinivesa, kimpariyosana”ti?
an6.52:2.2: “Khattiya kho, brahmana, bhogadhippaya pannupavicara baladhitthana pathavibhinivesa issariyapariyosana”ti.
an6.52:3.1: “Brahmana pana, bho gotama, kimadhippaya, kimupavicara, kimadhitthana, kimabhinivesa, kimpariyosana”ti?
an6.52:3.2: “Brahmana kho, brahmana, bhogadhippaya pannupavicara mantadhitthana yannabhinivesa brahmalokapariyosana”ti.
an6.52:4.1: “Gahapatika pana, bho gotama, kimadhippaya, kimupavicara, kimadhitthana, kimabhinivesa, kimpariyosana”ti?
an6.52:4.2: “Gahapatika kho, brahmana, bhogadhippaya pannupavicara sippadhitthana kammantabhinivesa nitthitakammantapariyosana”ti.
an6.52:5.1: “Itthi pana, bho gotama, kimadhippaya, kimupavicara, kimadhitthana, kimabhinivesa, kimpariyosana”ti?
an6.52:5.2: “Itthi kho, brahmana, purisadhippaya alankarupavicara puttadhitthana asapattibhinivesa issariyapariyosana”ti.
an6.52:6.1: “Cora pana, bho gotama, kimadhippaya, kimupavicara, kimadhitthana, kimabhinivesa, kimpariyosana”ti?
an6.52:6.2: “Cora kho, brahmana, adanadhippaya gahanupavicara satthadhitthana andhakarabhinivesa adassanapariyosana”ti.
an6.52:7.1: “Samana pana, bho gotama, kimadhippaya, kimupavicara, kimadhitthana, kimabhinivesa, kimpariyosana”ti?
an6.52:7.2: “Samana kho, brahmana, khantisoraccadhippaya pannupavicara siladhitthana akincannabhinivesa nibbanapariyosana”ti.
an6.52:8.2: Khattiyanampi bhavam gotamo janati adhippayanca upavicaranca adhitthananca abhinivesanca pariyosananca. Brahmananampi bhavam gotamo janati …pe… gahapatinampi bhavam gotamo janati … itthinampi bhavam gotamo janati … coranampi bhavam gotamo janati … samananampi bhavam gotamo janati adhippayanca upavicaranca adhitthananca abhinivesanca pariyosananca.
an6.52:8.4: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
